statements: SELECT * FROM telecom_security
SELECT communication_type, data_transfer_size FROM telecom_security WHERE communication_channel_id = 1
SELECT communication_type, transfer_date FROM telecom_security WHERE data_transfer_size > 100
SELECT * FROM telecom_security WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT communication_type FROM telecom_security
SELECT * FROM telecom_security WHERE data_transfer_size > 1000 ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT communication_channel_id, communication_type FROM telecom_security WHERE communication_type = 'VoIP' ORDER BY communication_channel_id ASC;
SELECT communication_channel_id, data_transfer_size FROM telecom_security WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY data_transfer_size DESC;
SELECT AVG(data_transfer_size) AS average_transfer_size, MIN(data_transfer_size) AS min_transfer_size, MAX(data_transfer_size) AS max_transfer_size FROM telecom_security;
SELECT * FROM telecom_security WHERE communication_type LIKE '%call%' ORDER BY communication_channel_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_channels;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM communication_channels WHERE channel_type = 'email';
SELECT channel_name, channel_status FROM communication_channels ORDER BY channel_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_transfers WHERE transfer_size > 1000;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, transfer_date FROM data_transfers ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_channels WHERE channel_type = 'Email';
SELECT channel_name, channel_status FROM communication_channels WHERE channel_type = 'SMS' ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT channel_id, channel_type, COUNT(*) AS num_transfers FROM data_transfers GROUP BY channel_id, channel_type HAVING num_transfers > 2;
SELECT cc.channel_name AS sender, COUNT(*) AS num_transfers FROM data_transfers dt JOIN communication_channels cc ON dt.sender_id = cc.channel_id GROUP BY sender ORDER BY num_transfers DESC;
SELECT MAX(transfer_size) AS max_transfer_size, AVG(transfer_size) AS avg_transfer_size FROM data_transfers WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM communication_channels;
SELECT * FROM data_transfers WHERE transfer_type = 'upload';
SELECT transfer_id, transfer_date, transfer_size FROM data_transfers ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT metadata_id, status FROM metadata WHERE data_id = 1;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type, encryption_type FROM communication_channels WHERE channel_type = 'email';
SELECT * FROM communication_channels WHERE channel_type = 'Email';
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM communication_channels WHERE channel_id > 3 ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT transfer_id, transfer_date, transfer_size FROM data_transfers WHERE transfer_size > 1000 ORDER BY transfer_date ASC;
SELECT metadata_id, data_id, status FROM metadata WHERE status = 'Processed' ORDER BY metadata_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_channels cc JOIN metadata m ON cc.channel_id = m.data_id WHERE m.status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM communications_metadata;
SELECT metadata_id, communication_channel, data_transfer_size FROM communications_metadata WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM communication_channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT channel_id, channel_name, channel_status FROM communication_channels WHERE channel_type = 'SMS' AND channel_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM data_transfers WHERE transfer_size > 1000 ORDER BY transfer_start ASC;
SELECT * FROM communications_metadata;
SELECT metadata_id, communication_channel, metadata_date FROM communications_metadata WHERE data_transfer_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM communications_metadata WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY metadata_date DESC;

SELECT communications_metadata.metadata_id, communication_channels.channel_name, data_transfers.transfer_type FROM communications_metadata JOIN communication_channels ON communications_metadata.metadata_id = communication_channels.channel_id JOIN data_transfers ON communications_metadata.metadata_id = data_transfers.transfer_id;
SELECT communication_channel, COUNT(*) as channel_count FROM communications_metadata GROUP BY communication_channel HAVING channel_count > 2 ORDER BY channel_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM communications LIMIT 5;
SELECT communication_id, communication_type FROM communications WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, communication_type FROM communications ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT communication_id, channel_id, communication_type FROM communications WHERE communication_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM transfer_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC LIMIT 4;
SELECT * FROM communications ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT communication_id,communication_type,timestamp FROM communications WHERE communication_type='Email';
SELECT c.channel_id,c.channel_name,c.channel_location,cm.metadata_type,cm.metadata_value FROM channel_metadata c INNER JOIN communication_metadata cm ON c.channel_id=cm.communication_id;
SELECT t.transfer_id,t.transfer_type,t.transfer_size,l.log_type,l.log_message FROM data_transfers t LEFT JOIN transfer_logs l ON t.transfer_id=l.transfer_id WHERE t.transfer_size > 1000;

SELECT c.communication_id,c.timestamp,m.metadata_type,m.metadata_value FROM communications c INNER JOIN communication_metadata m ON c.communication_id=m.communication_id WHERE m.metadata_type='Location';
